Key Match Events: Rashid Khan hurt his knee while fielding in Afghanistan's defeat to Sri Lanka in Brisbane on November 1
Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan will face Australia in their final match of the tournament on November 4
Rashid Khan has a familiarity factor with the Australian team as he played for Adelaide Strikers in the Big Bash League
Post-Match Reflections: Afghanistan's semi-final hopes ended after their loss to Sri Lanka
Rashid Khan will undergo scans to have the extent of the injury assessed
Miscellaneous Highlights: Afghanistan head coach Jonathan Trott ruled out any serious injury to Rashid Khan
Rashid Khan had a back injury concern before the World Cup
Others: The match was played at the Gabba in Brisbane
Afghanistan will meet Australia in Adelaide on November 4
